definitions.definition: An ill-tempered person full of stubborn ideas or opinions , often an older man.
examples: There's a cranky curmudgeon working at the hospital who gives all the patients and other doctors flak.
John Doe's old age and stubborn aversion to new ideas make him a curmudgeon of a candidate.

main_definition: An ill-tempered person full of stubborn ideas or opinions , often an older man.
